documentation.text:
@title MonadDeathmatch Smart Contract
 @dev A daily elimination game where 100 players compete over 30 days
 Features:
 - Daily elimination of 3 players
 - Three-phase reward distribution (10%, 15%, 50%)
 - Betting system for final winner and top 10
 - Multiple pools support
 - Uses native MON instead of MON token
